column2: "Iyi ekyir no ɔbaa dɛ
column3: David bisaa EWURADZE dɛ
column4: Ana momfow nkɔ Juda nkurow no bi mu a? Na EWURADZE buaa no dɛ
column5: Fow kɔ. Na David bisaa dɛ
column6: Henfa na momfow monkɔ? Na EWURADZE see no dɛ

column2: "Nna David sii mu kɔr hɔ
column3: ɔnye ne yernom beenu no so
column5: na Karmelnyi Nabal no kunafo Abigail."

column2: "Na David dze ne mbarimba a wɔka no ho so bae
column3: ɔbarimba biara nye ne fifo na wɔbɛtsenatsenaa Hebron nkurow no mu."

column2: "Na Juda mbarimba bae
column3: na hɔ na wɔseraa David hyɛɛ no hen wɔ Juda fi do. Na wɔkaa kyerɛɛ David dɛ
column4: Jabes-gileadfo nye hɔn a wosiee Saul."

column2: "Na David somaa abɔfo ma wɔkɔr Jabes-gileadfo hɔ kɛsee hɔn dɛ
column3: EWURADZE nhyira hom
column4: dɛ hom akyerɛ hom wura do ayamuyie yi

column2: "Na afei EWURADZE nkyerɛ hom do ayamuyie na nokwar: na mo so mebɛyɛ hom dɛm ayamuyie yi bi
column3: osiandɛ hom ayɛ adze a oye."

column2: "Dɛm ntsi afei wɔmma hom nsa nhyɛ dzen
column3: na hom nyɛ ndam: na hom wura Saul ewu
column4: na eso Juda fi asera me ahyɛ me hen wɔ hɔn do."

column2: "Afei Ner ba Abner a nna ɔyɛ Saul no dɔm do safohen no
column3: faa Saul ne ba Is-boset na ɔdze no twae baa Mahanaim;"

column2: "na ɔhyɛɛ no Gilead
column3: na Asurfo

column2: "Aber a Saul ne ba Is-boset hyɛɛ ase dzii hen wɔ Israel do no nna oedzi mfe eduanan
column3: na odzii hen mfe ebien. Na Juda fi dze

column2: "Na mber a David dze dzii hen wɔ Juda fi do wɔ Hebron no yɛ mfe esuon na abosoom esia."
"Na Abner
column3: Ner ba no
column4: na Saul ne ba Is-boset no nkowaa no

column2: "Na Zeruia ba Joab
column3: na David no nkowaa no tui kɔree
column4: na wokehyiaa hɔn wɔ Gibeon nsutaae no ho; na wɔtsenatsenaa famu hɔ
column5: kor wɔ nsutaae no ne nkyɛn fakor
column6: na kor so wɔ nsutaae no ne nkyɛn fakor so."

column2: "Na Abner see Joab dɛ
column3: Sɛ epɛ a
column4: ma wo mberantsɛ no nsoɛr mbɔsɔ hɔn ahoɔdzen nhwɛ wɔ hɛn enyim. Na Joab see dɛ

column2: "Nna wɔsoɛree kaan hɔnho kɔree; Benjamin
column3: na Saul ne ba Is-boset dze

column2: "Na hɔn mu obiara suoo ne nyɛnko ne tsir mu
column3: na ɔdze n'afona wɔɔ ne nyɛnko ne mfemu; ma wɔbɔɔ mu hwee ase wui: dɛm ntsi wɔfrɛɛ bea no Helkat-hazurim a ɔwɔ Gibeon."

column2: "Na ɔko no mu yɛɛ dzen dodoodow da no; na wɔkaa Abner na Israel mbarimba no gui wɔ David no nkowaa no enyim."
"Nna Zeruia ne mbabanyin baasa no
column3: Joab
column6: nna Asahel n'anan ho yɛ har dɛ hamu adoa."

column2: "Na Asahel tsiiw Abner; na ɔrokɔ no oemmfi Abner ekyir anndan ammfa enyimfa anaa abankum."
"Nna Abner hwɛɛ n'ekyir
column3: na ɔsee dɛ
column5: ɔwo nye no a? Na obuaa dɛ

column2: "Na Abner see no dɛ
column3: Dan woho wɔ nkyɛn kɔ w'enyimfa anaa abankum
column4: na kɛkyer mberantsɛ no mu bi
column5: na gye n'akodze. Na Asahel ammpɛ dɛ ɔbɛdan noho wɔ nkyɛn efi n'ekyir."

column2: "Na Abner see Asahel bio dɛ
column3: Dan woho wɔ nkyɛn fi m'ekyir: ebɛnadze ntsi na mommbɔ wo monnhwe famu? Na mibesi dɛn metum ama m'enyi do hwɛ wo nua Joab?"

column2: "Naaso ɔammpen dɛ ɔdan noho wɔ nkyɛn: dɛm ntsi Abner dze peaa no no tun wɔɔ ne yafun mu
column3: ma peaa no hwiraa mu puee n'ekyir; na ɔhwee ase wɔ hɔ
column4: na owui wɔ bea no do hɔ ara: na ɔbaa dɛ
column5: dodow a wodur beebi mbrɛ Asahel hwee ase wui no

column2: "Na Joab na Abishai dze wotsiiw Abner: na aber a wodur Amma koko a ɔda Gia enyim wɔ Gibeon sar no do ɔkwan ho no
column3: nna iwi tɔree."

column2: "Na Benjaminmba no poon hɔnho boaa ano bedzii Abner ekyir
column3: na wɔbɛyɛɛ ikuw kor

column2: "Nna Abner frɛɛ Joab na ɔsee dɛ
column3: Aso yɛnkɔ do nkuku hɛnho daa? Ana ɔwo innyim dɛ n'ekyir no ɔbɛyɛ wenwen bi a? Na onkodu dabɛn ara ansaana ase ako mbarimba no dɛ wongyaa hɔn nuanom ekyir dzi na wɔnsan?"

column2: "Na Joab see dɛ
column3: Dɛ Nyankopɔn tse ase yi
column5: ampaara nkyɛ anapa no dɔm no kɔree
column6: na nkyɛ obiara enndzi no nua n'ekyir so."

column2: "Nna Joab hɛɛn abɛn
column3: na dɔm no nyinara gyinaa dzinn

column2: "Na Abner na ne mbarimba no sii mu anadwe no nyinara koduaa Araba; na wokotwaa Jordan
column3: na wokoduaa Bitron nyinara mu

column2: "Na Joab fii Abner ekyir sanee: na ɔpoon no dɔm no nyinara boaa ano no
column3: nna David no nkowaa no mu nyimpa duakron na Asahel na woefi mu."

column2: "Naaso David no nkowaa no dze nna woekuku Benjaminmba a nna wɔyɛ Abner ne mbarimba no mu bi
column3: na nyimpa ahaasa eduosia atotɔr."

column2: "Na wɔmaa Asahel do
column3: na wokesiee no wɔ n'egya n'asamandan a ɔwɔ Bɛtlɛhɛm no mu. Na Joab na ne mbarimba no sii mu anadwe no nyinara kɔree na adze kyee hɔn wɔ Hebron."
